availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Francis Marion "Doc" Godmon (Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer )

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John B. Godman and Sally Redd Godman Rutledge. Stepson of William W. Rutledge. Resident of Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned one enslaved person in Harrison County in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860. Household owned one enslaved person in Harrison County in 1860. Farmer in Harrison County in 1863.
